properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RESER_NO = RV_RESER_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT HOTEL_NAME, MEM_ID, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD')"CREATE_DATE", RV_RESER_NO FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RE_MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM ON (TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL ON (TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_REVIEW ON (RV_RESER_NO = RESER_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO = TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, MEM_ID, NICKNAME,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD'),RV_RESER_NO ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT HOTEL_NAME, ROOM_NAME, CASE WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 1 THEN '★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 2 THEN '★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 3 THEN '★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 4 THEN '★★★★' ELSE '★★★★★' END AS "REVIEW_SCORE", REVIEW_CONTENT, IMG_PATH FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RESER_NO = RV_RESER_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM ON (TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL ON (TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE REVIEW_YN = 'Y' AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND RV_RESER_NO = ? GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, ROOM_NAME,REVIEW_SCORE,REVIEW_CONTENT,IMG_PATH
UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REVIEW_YN = 'N' WHERE RV_RESER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT ( CO_RESER_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COMMENT_MEM_NO ) VALUES ( ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )

SELECT CO_RESER_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(TB_COMMENT.CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE", NICKNAME FROM TB_COMMENT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = COMMENT_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_REVIEW ON (RV_RESER_NO = CO_RESER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_YN = 'Y' AND CO_RESER_NO = ?
